name: Spicy Tower
description:
Game heavily inspired by Icy Tower, created for #KaJAM2022

Goal of the game is to achieve the highest possible score.
Score is increased by climbing floors.

You will get extra bonus points for (bonuses are cumulative):
- climbing several floors in one jump
- catching the stars

Lava is dangerous and you will die if you touch it.
Lava speed is increased by climbing floors.

#Tips:

- auto jump is available, it is recommended to use it to achieve higher score and floor,
- if you want to jump higher just get maximum speed before jumping,

#Credits:

Music: https://freesound.org/people/DaveJf/sounds/623616/
